data.name: Emma's Armaments
data.detailed_description:
Your father has disappeared leaving you in debt!
The only way to get the money back is to successfully run the store!
Emma collects items in the dungeon, smelts them, and Caro sells them for a higher price!
Help the two manage the store with your help!

[Game Flow]
Go to the dungeon and defeat monsters. You can get items by defeating monsters. Items can be "sold" or used for "alchemy," which combines two or more items to create a new item.
If you run low on energy while in the dungeon, click the "return home" button to go home. You can bring back the items you acquired in the dungeon. If you have no energy left, you cannot bring back the items.
Items can be refined to make them even more powerful and valuable. Since powerful items make dungeon attack much easier, be proactive about smelting items.
Items and monsters have attributes. There are four types of attributes: none, fire, grass, and water. The non-attribute has no particular effect, but fire is strong against grass, grass is strong against water, and water is strong against fire. Attribute compatibility increases attack power and decreases damage received, so be careful about the attributes of items you equip.
The game is completed when the player's assets exceed 10 million G!

data.short_description: Emma's Weapons Shop is a management simulation game in which players collect items while conquering dungeons, smelt them, and sell them at higher prices to increase sales.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
